integrationCategories.databaseSubtitle: Seamlessly connect and manage your databases with NocoDB.
integrationCategories.communicationSubtitle: Get notified on changes and streamline team communication with NocoDB.
integrationCategories.projectManagementSubtitle: Enhance project workflows and task management with NocoDB.
integrationCategories.crmSubtitle: Optimize customer relationship management through NocoDB integrations.
integrationCategories.marketingSubtitle: Boost your marketing efforts with NocoDB's powerful integrations.
integrationCategories.atsSubtitle: Streamline your applicant tracking system with NocoDB.
integrationCategories.developmentSubtitle: Accelerate development processes with NocoDB integrations.
integrationCategories.financeSubtitle: Simplify financial operations and data management with NocoDB.
integrationCategories.ticketingSubtitle: Manage and track support tickets efficiently with NocoDB.
integrationCategories.storageSubtitle: Integrate and organize your storage solutions seamlessly with NocoDB.
integrationCategories.othersSubtitle: Discover additional versatile integrations to enhance your NocoDB experience.
integrationCategories.spreadSheetSubtitle: Connect and manage your spreadsheets with NocoDB.

tooltip.currentDateNotAvail: Current date option not available for this data source / data type
tooltip.privateConnection: Enable to make this connection private and hidden from other creators in this workspace.
tooltip.optionalDatabaseName: Optional. Uses default database "{database}" if left blank
tooltip.optionalSchemaName: Optional. Uses default schema "{schema}" if left blank.
tooltip.schemaChangeDisabled: Schema editing is disabled for this data source.
tooltip.dataWriteOptionDisabled: Data editing can only be disabled when 'Schema editing' is also disabled.
tooltip.allowMetaWrite: This option allows modification of database schema, including adding, altering, or deleting tables and columns. Use with caution, as changes may impact the structural integrity of your database.
tooltip.allowDataWrite: This option allows creating, updating, or deleting records within database tables. Ideal for administrative users needing to change data directly.
tooltip.reachedSourceLimit: Limited to only one data source for the moment
tooltip.extDB: Podporuje MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server a SQLite
tooltip.exportMetadata: Export všetkých metadát z meta tabuliek do meta adresára.
tooltip.importMetadata: Import všetkých metaúdajov z adresára meta do metatabuliek.
tooltip.clearMetadata: Vymazanie všetkých metadát z meta tabuliek.
tooltip.preFillFormInfo: Generate share form URL with pre-filled field data. To get a pre-filled link, make sure you’ve filled the necessary fields in the form view builder.
tooltip.surveyFormInfo: Form mode with one field per page
tooltip.useFieldEditMenuToConfigFieldType: Use field edit menu for type conversions after file is imported
tooltip.comingSoonIntegration: Coming soon! Click to upvote for the integration you need in NocoDB.

formula.hintStart: Hint: Use {placeholder1} to reference fields, e.g: {placeholder2}. For more, please check out
formula.cantSaveFieldFormulaInvalid: Can’t save field because formula is invalid
formula.typeIsExpectedButFound: Type {type} is expected but found Type {found}
formula.firstParamWeekDayHaveDate: The first parameter of WEEKDAY() should have date value
formula.secondParamWeekDayHaveDate: The second parameter of WEEKDAY() should have the value either "sunday", "monday", "tuesday", "wednesday", "thursday", "friday" or "saturday"
formula.firstParamDateAddHaveDate: The first parameter of DATEADD() should have date value
formula.secondParamDateAddHaveNumber: The second parameter of DATEADD() should have numeric value
formula.thirdParamDateAddHaveDate: The third parameter of DATEADD() should have the value either "day", "week", "month" or "year"
formula.firstParamDateDiffHaveDate: The first parameter of DATEDIFF() should have date value
formula.secondParamDateDiffHaveDate: The second parameter of DATEDIFF() should have date value
formula.thirdParamDateDiffHaveDate: The third parameter of DATETIME_DIFF() should have value either "milliseconds", "ms", "seconds", "s", "minutes", "m", "hours", "h", "days", "d", "weeks", "w", "months", "M", "quarters", "Q", "years", or "y"
formula.cantSaveCircularReference: Can’t save field because it causes a circular reference
formula.columnWithTypeFoundButExpected: Field {columnName} with {columnType} type is found but {expectedType} type is expected

msg.postgresHasItsOwnCurrencySettings: PostgreSQL 'money' type has own currency settings
msg.validColumnsForBarCode: The valid Field Types for a Barcode Field are: Number, Single Line Text, Long Text, Phone Number, URL, Email, Decimal. Please create one first.

info.shareBasePublic: Ktokoľvek na internete s týmto odkazom si môže pozrieť
info.userInviteNoSMTP: Zdá sa, že ste ešte nenakonfigurovali mailer! Prosím, skopírujte vyššie uvedený odkaz na pozvánku a pošlite ho na adresu
info.dragDropHide: Presuňte sem polia, ktoré chcete skryť

info.privateLinkAdditionalInfo: Ľudia so súkromným prepojením môžu vidieť iba bunky viditeľné v tomto zobrazení

info.collabView: Spolupracovníci s oprávneniami na úpravu alebo vyššími môžu zmeniť konfiguráciu zobrazenia.
info.lockedView: Konfiguráciu zobrazenia nemôže nikto upravovať, kým nie je odomknutá.
info.personalView: Konfiguráciu zobrazenia môžete upravovať iba vy. Osobné pohľady ostatných spolupracovníkov sú predvolene skryté.
info.ownerDesc: Môže pridávať/odstraňovať tvorcov. Úplná úprava databázových štruktúr a polí.
info.creatorDesc: Môže plne upravovať štruktúru databázy a hodnoty.
info.editorDesc: Môžete upravovať záznamy, ale nemôžete meniť štruktúru databázy/polí.
info.commenterDesc: Môže si záznamy prezerať a komentovať, ale nemôže nič upravovať
info.viewerDesc: Môžete zobraziť záznamy, ale nemôžete nič upravovať
info.staticRoleInfo: Systémom definované roly nie je možné upravovať
info.exportZip: Exportovať meta projektu do súboru zip a stiahnuť.
info.importZip: Importujte meta súbor zip projektu a reštartujte ho.
info.importText: Import projektu NocoDB nahraním súboru zip s metadátami
info.sqlMigration: Migrácie schém sa vytvoria automaticky. Vytvorte tabuľku a obnovte túto stránku.

sponsor.message: Sme malý tím, ktorý na plný úväzok pracuje na tom, aby sa NocoDB stala open-source. Veríme, že nástroj ako NocoDB by mal byť voľne dostupný každému riešiteľovi problémov na internete.
